comments.author: bwinton@latte.ca
comments.raw_text:
kyushu-u.ac.jp is getting a lot of hits, and if you merge them (because they have the same MX record), would be in our top 10.  It would be nice to add them to the ISPDB, I think…

http://www.google.ca/search?q=thunderbird+site%3Akyushu-u.ac.jp has some links with info that might be useful…
